item.description:
The Department of Conservation and Recreation (DCR) is asking for stakeholder input into the development of a Resource Management Plan (RMP) for the Myles Standish State Forest. To help DCR create the most comprehensive RMP possible will require input from all stakeholders. This meeting is hosted by the Friends of MSSF to provide an opportunity for you to share your suggestions and offer your "vision" for the future management of MSSF recreational resources directly to the MA Department of Conservation and Recreation planners. Please try to attend. Meet at the MSSF Headquarters Conference Building. Dessert provided.

Your input is very important to the future of the forest. If you can't make it to the meeting, you may send written comments to Jim Baecker, Office of Regional Planning, 251 Causeway Street, Suite 700, Boston, MA 02114, or send email to jim.baecker@state.ma.us.
item.how_to_find_us: The Conference Building is across the street from the Headquarters Parking lot. It's a big building with stairs leading to the front door.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Recreation Resource Management Workshop
